an5.216:1.3: Bahuno janassa appiyo hoti amanapo, luddo ca hoti, vippatisari ca, sammulho kalam karoti, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an5.216:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava akkhantiya.
an5.216:2.3: Bahuno janassa piyo hoti manapo, aluddo ca hoti, avippatisari ca, asammulho kalam karoti, kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
an5.216:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca anisamsa khantiya”ti.
